name: monomaniac
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who is extremely interested in only one thing, often to such a degree that they are mentally ill: The book portrayed him as a monomaniac and a monster. He was a monomaniac who was not entirely responsible for his actions. See
monomania
More examplesFewer examplesI'm not so much of a monomaniac as this collection makes me seem.The single-minded ones, the monomaniacs, are the only true achievers.You could either look at him as a man of total commitment or as a monomaniac.

suffering from or relating to monomania (= a condition in which someone is extremely interested in one thing): The story switches between the neglected genius and the monomaniac academic. Monomaniac politicians and media moguls are among the causes of poverty, not their cure. See
monomania
More examplesFewer examplesThe consequences of his judgmental, monomaniac vision are left for others to deal with.You are drawn into his extravagant monomaniac vision.
